amendment.description: Amendment provides that the amendment specified in section 6 shall be in order in lieu of amendment number 5 in House Report 112-88.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the amendment specified in section 6 shall be in order in lieu of amendment number 5 in House Report 112-88.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
